front.title: Security Attacks Found Against SCTP and Current Countermeasures

abstract.t: Stream Control Transmission Protocol defined in RFC 2960 is a multi- homed transport protocol. As such, unique security threats exists that are addressed in various ways within the protocol itself. This document attempts to detail the known security threats and their countermeasures as detailed in the current version of the SCTP Implementors guide RFC 4460. It is hoped that this information will provide some useful background information for many of the newest requirements spelled out in the SCTP Implementors guide.
